name: WP Youtube Relevant Video Player
author: Srijan Gupta

sections.description:
Automatically searches video from youtube relevant for your blog by use of your blog title!!
Also have option to display the youtube video of your choice just by coping the url!!
sections.installation:
Upload the WP Youtube Relavant Video Player plugin to your blog, Activate it.
Give title. Enter url if you want your video to get embed. Otherwise leave it blank for us to search you relevant video.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!

0.2

  • Enables you to resize the video in three sizes.

0.3

Updated for the new version

short_description: WP Youtube Relevant Video Player embed relevant youtube video for your blog!!
